会釈: (えしゃく) - nod; salutation; greeting; recognition; bow
会長: (かいちょう) - president (of a society); chairman
会飲: (かいいん) - drinking and carousing together
会館: (かいかん) - meeting hall; assembly hall
伝: (den/tsuta) - transmit , means of making contact, intermediary, go-between; connections, influence, pull, good offices
伝い歩き: (つたいあるき) - walking while holding on to something (such as a wall or table); cruising (i.e. children learning to walk)
伝う: (つたう) - to go along; to walk along; to follow
伝える: (tsutaeru) - transmitir, relatar, transmitir, comunicar, contar, transmitir, propagar, ensinar, legar
伝え反り: (つたえぞり) - {sumo} underarm forward body drop
伝え合う: (つたえあう) - to exchange (e.g. messages, thoughts, etc.); to communicate
伝え聞く: (つたえきく) - to learn by hearsay
伝って登る: (つたってのぼる) - to shin up; to climb up
伝わる: (つたわる) - to be handed down; to be introduced; to be transmitted; to be circulated; to go along; to walk along
伝世: (でんせい) - transmission from generation to generation
伝令者: (でんれいしゃ) - herald; orderly; messenger
伝令ＲＮＡ: (でんれいアールエヌエー) - messenger RNA; mRNA
伝写: (でんしゃ) - copying and transmitting a text
伝動: (でんどう) - transmission (of motive power); drive; gearing
伝受: (でんじゅ) - being initiated (e.g. into the arts); receiving instruction
伝声: (でんせい) - verbal message; relaying a message
伝声管: (でんせいかん) - speaking tube; voice pipe
伝奏: (でんそう) - delivering a message to the emperor
伝家: (でんか) - heirloom; trump card; last resort; family tradition
伝家の宝刀: (でんかのほうとう) - one's last resort/trump card; (orig. meaning) treasured family sword
伝家の宝刀を抜く: (でんかのほうとうをぬく) - to employ one's secret weapon; to play one's trump card; to use the ace up one's sleeve
伝手: (つて) - intermediary; influence; good offices; connections; someone to trust; go-between; pull
伝承: (でんしょう) - transmission; hand down (information); legend; tradition; folklore
伝承叙事詩: (でんしょうじょじし) - oral epic
伝承文学: (でんしょうぶんがく) - oral literature
伝播: (でんぱん) - transmission; propagation; spread; circulation; diffusion; dissemination
伝書鳩: (でんしょばと) - carrier pigeon; homing pigeon
伝来: (でんらい) - ancestral; hereditary; imported; transmitted; handed down
伝染る: (うつる) - to be infected; to be contagious
伝染を防ぐ: (でんせんをふせぐ) - to prevent infection
伝染性単核球症: (でんせんせいたんかくきゅうしょう) - infectious mononucleosis; mono; glandular fever

伝染性軟属腫: (でんせんせいなんぞくしゅ) - molluscum contagiosum; viral infection of the skin
伝染病: (でんせんびょう) - infectious disease; contagious disease; epidemic
伝法: (でんぽう) - teaching Buddhism; rough person; bullying; ostentatious bravado

伝法肌: (でんぼうはだ) - rough-and-tumble; bullying disposition
伝票発行処理: (でんぴょうはっこうしょり) - billing

伝統音楽: (でんとうおんがく) - traditional music
伝統食: (でんとうしょく) - traditional food; ancestral food
